Higher Education with Kaplan International

THE BENEFITS OF LEARNING ENGLISHaaaaa

The smartest investment in your future

CONTACT AN ADVISOR

With Kaplan Your Academic Career Will Go Further

Many of the world’s most prestigious universities are in English-speaking countries across the world. A degree from one of these institutions demonstrates your ability to thrive in a new environment and will open doors to a promising career at home and abroad.

Our higher education services help you gain access to these universities and develop your English language skills, that will best prepare you for studying abroad and securing your future.

Contact an Advisor For more information

Learn more

Higher Education

University Placement Service

Our University Placement Service allows you to benefit from our extensive network of partner universities and colleges. Combined with our wealth of experience, we help you gain entry to graduate and undergraduate courses in the USA, UK, Canada, and Ireland.

A degree from a prestigious university is a great way to launch your international career

  • Benefit from our extensive network of 250+ college and university partners
  • We’ll help you find the perfect degree or vocational program
  • Providing expert guidance through the application process

Learn More About University Placement Service

Learn more

Higher Education

Community College

Admission into top-ranked US universities is extremely competitive. Let our Community College programme help you study abroad and gain access to a degree from a prestigious US university.

Our Community Colleges have the right professional, technical, and degree programs with a possible university transfer pathway to fit your educational and career goals.

  • Save time and money with a college to university transfer programme
  • Dedicated advisor support through the college to university pathway
  • Guaranteed community college admission

Learn More About Community College

Learn more

Higher Education

Pathways

Our university pathway programs help international students to develop the academic skills, subject knowledge, and the English Language ability needed to study a bachelor's or master's degree, while adapting to life and study abroad.

With Kaplan, you can gain a university degree abroad that might otherwise be out of reach, and make a hugely worthwhile investment in your future.

  • Gain entry into the best universities around the world
  • Enhance your career prospects and transform your future
  • 3,000+ degree options at bachelor's, master's and doctorate level

Learn More About University Pathways

“I will find the Career Essentials course very useful for my International career. I already have a master’s degree in International Business, but it will help me to learn it in English with a new vocabulary. After Kaplan, I will work in Canada as a franchising consultant.”
Dauvergne Jonathan from France Graduated from Oxford University
“The teachers make learning English interesting and fun, especially when the topic is hard to understand or when we feel a bit tired from our morning lessons! Job Club really helped me to improve my resume in English and practice my interview Skills.”
Student Name from Country Graduated from Lorem Northeastern University
